definition: opera (or role) involving much singing and action/(fig.) highlight/main feature/major activity
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Using a gun is one of the students' specialities.
sentences.chinese: 用枪，是警官学校特殊的重头戏之一。

sentences.english: The launch of the iPad was the highlight - another groundbreaking consumer Internet device that re-defined a market!
sentences.chinese: iPad是苹果的重头戏，重新定义了一个市场。

sentences.english: Our main attraction tonight is lady mud wrestling.
sentences.chinese: 我们今晚的重头戏是女子泥浆摔跤。

sentences.english: For some guys, the annual fishing trip is the highlight of their calendar.
sentences.chinese: 有些人把每年的钓鱼之旅视为是行事历上的重头戏。

sentences.english: Oh, not the main act, but the guy who comes on first is a crack-up.
sentences.chinese: 哦，重头戏一般，但是第一个出场的家伙挺逗。

sentences.english: The script itself may be an overwhelming task, but one of the first stepping stones is actually beginning the script.
sentences.chinese: 剧本是压倒一切的重头戏，但是千里之行，始于足下。

definition: see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]
of the utmost importance/of highest priority
(fig.) to raise the curtain/to lift the curtain/to be a curtain raiser for
anew/from the beginning/(in poetry and song) repetition of a melody or rhythm
to start shooting or firing/to win an initial success/to succeed (of a plan)
cannot do without/to be unavoidable/are bound to be many
